mapper.select: SELECT a.board_no , a.board_title , a.board_content , a.mem_id , b.mem_name , TO_CHAR(a.board_date, 'MM/dd HH:mm') AS board_date FROM boards a, members b WHERE 1=1 AND a.mem_id = b.mem_id AND a.del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY a.board_no DESC
SELECT time_list FROM reserv_time WHERE time_list NOT IN ( SELECT reserv_time FROM reserv WHERE reserv_date = #{reservDate} AND del_yn = 'N' ) ORDER BY 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reserv WHERE 1=1 AND reserv_name = #{reservName} AND reserv_phone = #{reservPhone} AND del_yn = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE reserv SET del_yn = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND reserv_name = #{reservName} AND reserv_phone = #{reservPhone}
